adDetails: HELLO, IF YOU LOOKING FOR GOOD CLEANING SERVICE, THEN WE ARE HERE FOR HELP YOU. PLEASE CALL OR TEX ANY TIME show contact info Nohemi OUR SERVICE INCLUDE BUT NOT LIMITED. All Rooms And Entire Home: Dusting, vacuuming, sweeping, and mopping of entire home. Wood floors, marble, granite, All baseboards wiped clean All cobwebs removed. All trash out. BATHROOMS. Entire bathroom cleaned and sanitized, KITCHENS All cabinetry exterior cleaned Sink and counter tops cleaned and sanitized Stove top, microwave cleaned and degrease. Refrigerator exterior cleaned and sanitized. All Cleaning products And Equipment Are Supply, But We Use Yours Y You Prefer. Please Call Or Tex show contact info Ask for Nohemi. Thank you.
